org.apache.flink.graph.drivers.parameter

类 SimpleParameter<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.graph.drivers.parameter.SimpleParameter<T>
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    Parameter<T>
    直接已知子类:
    BooleanParameter, ChoiceParameter, DoubleParameter, LongParameter, StringParameter

    public abstract class SimpleParameter<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements Parameter<T>
    A Parameter with a default value.

    • 字段概要

      Set the parameter name and add this parameter to the list of parameters stored by owner.

      • SimpleParameter

        protected SimpleParameter(ParameterizedBase owner,
                          java.lang.String name)
        Set the parameter name and add this parameter to the list of parameters stored by owner.
        参数:
        owner - the Parameterized using this Parameter
        name - the parameter name

    • 方法详细资料

      • setDefaultValue

        protected SimpleParameter setDefaultValue(T defaultValue)
        Set the default value, used if no value is set by the command-line configuration.
        参数:
        defaultValue - the default value
        返回:
        this

      • getUsage

        public java.lang.String getUsage()
        从接口复制的说明: Parameter
        An informal usage string. Parameter names are prefixed with "--".

        Optional parameters are enclosed by "[" and "]".

        Generic values are represented by all-caps with specific values enclosed by "<" and ">".

        指定者:
        getUsage 在接口中 Parameter<T>
        返回:
        command-line usage string

      • isHidden

        public boolean isHidden()
        从接口复制的说明: Parameter
        A hidden parameter is parsed from the command-line configuration but is not printed in the usage string. This can be used for power-user options not displayed to the general user.
        指定者:
        isHidden 在接口中 Parameter<T>
        返回:
        whether this parameter should be hidden from standard usage

      • getValue

        public T getValue()
        从接口复制的说明: Parameter
        Get the parameter value.
        指定者:
        getValue 在接口中 Parameter<T>
        返回:
        parameter value
